entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
